column5: Who's signed up for this Saturday's Perchin' For MS Fishing Derby? Looks like it will actually take place this year! Fun event & a great cause!Â http://www.perchinforms.com/
Nice... i added the site to my FB page as well.
Dave I am going to pin this on the front page to help spread the word.  Art

A super tough fish at this event weather was warm but snowing most of the day! My partner Al Russell & myself only caught 6 of our eligible 10 fish limit for a total of 4.40 lbs. Happened to good enough for 4th place overall! Another great fundraiser for MS research!
